meanings.sent1: The garden was full of snails after the rain.
meanings.sent2: I found some snails crawling on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The snails had a race to see who could reach the lettuce first.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved as slowly as snails on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The child collected colorful snails in a jar to observe them closely.

meanings.definition: To move at a slow, sluggish pace.
meanings.sent1: The old car snails along the bumpy road.
meanings.sent2: We snails through the crowded market to avoid losing each other.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy cat snails lazily towards its cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: Time snails by when you're waiting for something exciting.
meanings.sent5: The tired hiker snails up the steep mountain trail, taking breaks often.
